body_html: @jrabary thank you for sharing the code. Could you try setting num_packs=0 when you define the cross_tower_ops using AllReduceCrossTowerOps? My hypothesis is that it is packing all the gradients into 2 tensors (with num_packs=2) and this is too big for nccl to handle.

body: @jrabary thank you for sharing the code. Could you try setting `num_packs=0` when you define the `cross_tower_ops` using `AllReduceCrossTowerOps`? My hypothesis is that it is packing all the gradients into 2 tensors (with num_packs=2) and this is too big for nccl to handle.
